reviews.content: We loved every minute of our stay at The Rama Residence Padma. The room was better than expected with a huge comfortable bed and large kitchen/living area. All areas in the hotel were clean and well kept. The pool area was stunning with a range of seat in options anda lovely infinity pool. We were invited to a drinks reception at thd poolside on the Monday evening and this was a lovely touch encouraging guests to get to know each other. The breakfasts were lovely with a range of local, english and American style options. All the staff were friendly and helpful. The location was ideal, only a short walk from the beach and the area had a really laid back and chilled vibe.  We would definitely return.

We stayed at the Rama Residence Padma recently for 3 weeks and loved it. All the staff were friendly and helpful, the hotel is kept fantastically clean and you can tell the staff take pride in there jobs, it had a great rooftop pool area.  We stayed in a studio room (310) room was great and comfy with plenty of space though the balcony is very small and being below the pool you can hear the water sloshing around when people are using it which isn’t ideal though it didn’t spoil our holiday and I’d definitely stay here again, though I’d pay a bit extra and go for a different room on a lower floor and a larger balcony. The hotel is good value for money with great staff and the breakfast is great. The local area is good with plenty of bars, restaurants, spa’s and shops on the door step and the beach is a couple of minutes walk straight down the road
really nice place to stay and relax. very cordial and helpful staff.

Our room was huge and very well appointed.  The bed was huge and very comfortable. There was also a seperate sitting room with it's own TV.  The included breakfast allowed us to choose anything from the  menu which was very extensive and very tasty.  The staff were very friendly and welcoming. The rooftop pool was very nice to relax by and it is a very quick walk to the beach.  The location is very handy for pubs, sports bars and shopping too.  Hotel security is very good as you need your key-pass to operate the lift. All areas of the hotel were immaculately clean. Having the laundry facilities was handy. We would definitely stay here again if we come back to Bali.
Breakfast was great, staff and room were good however the towels need the be refreshed as they are abit old and have marks on them.
Close to beach and shopping, good eating/drinking out the front door. Staff eager to please nothing to much trouble. Rooftop pool with limited shady areas

The pillows were horrible. Everything else was really good.
We did have two beds pushed together for the king.

Love this hotel 
The bed was like sleeping on a cloud
Staff are fabulous breakfast is amazing 
Close walk to everything 
Would stay here over and over again
Love love love 
They even decorated for my birthday

We stayed ten nights at Rama residence and enjoyed almost every part of our stay apart from the pool temp which was a bit on the cool side due to the time of year. Apart from the temp the rooftop pool was great and proved to be an awesome spot at sunset.  Located in Legian 3 minutes from the beach made it an even better experience. Would definitely stay again.

reviews.summary: Great place close to beach and restaurants
reviews.content: We had a great time here. Was perfect for our family of four as it had seperate rooms. Enormous main bed, can easily sleep three in it.  We had the rooftop room right by the pool, loving having a free laundry and dryer next to us. Staff really friendly and helpful. Lots of markets, restaurants nearby too and very close to the beach.
Great position with lovely staff. The breakfast was wonderful and enjoyed sunsets at the rooftop pool
Had a great time on Penida. Scenery was spectacular!

reviews.summary: Great place for a family holiday
reviews.content:
great place to stay especially with kids as the rooms set up means you have your own space

Staff are awesome and very friendly and the hotel is well located to the beach, shops and restaurants

reviews.summary: Staff are wonderful. Hotel in great spot.
reviews.content:
The good - friendly staff, hotel in great position close to beach, pool on top floor, laundry facilities, good size rooms. Free breakfast with our deal.
The not so good from someone who has been to the Asian region more than 30 times. Walls are paper thin. Could hear conversations clearly from next room(s). Constant scraping of furniture from above and sides all through the night on hard floor. Don't know why people aren't sleeping.Water from shower/shower drain smelled quite bad.
Really amazing. Just wifi issues but that’s all. The staff were just the best! Ensuring we were always ok!

We stayed 8 nights in May 2018 and were extremely happy with our Deluxe Premier room. 
The staff were all extremely friendly and helpful, especially Kadek, whose name we changed to "Kodok Kecil" which means "Small Frog". There is a wayward Pomme named Richard, (Great guy) that sits at the front bar and gives help and advice to the guests. He said he works for the group (Wouldn't call that work myself) and  I happened to mention that it was the wife's birthday. Later that afternoon, there was a knock at the door and most of the reception staff turned up with a cake and sang "Happy Birthday", which went down very well. The included breakfast was good and they do the best burger there. The roof top pool has speccy views over the beach area, but although I saw the nice Gym, that was close enough for me. We highly recommend the place and would like to stay there again. West Aussie couple.  Five stars *****.

reviews.summary: One of the best in Legian!
reviews.content: This hotel is new and is the best location in Legian with dining, shopping and transport at your doorstep and the beach a 2 min walk away. From the time we checked in until we checked out, we had a good experience. Staff were friendly and the Manager Richard was visible all the time and helping his staff if any issues were encountered (which there weren't). We received an upgrade at checkin and had a very spacious 2 room suite which included a lounge area, kitchenette and a king size bedroom overlooking the beach. The hotel and rooms are modern and clean. The large bathroom was great and everything worked well which is unusual for Bali. Wifi was great and accessible throughout the hotel. Amazing infinity pool with a view of the beach and plenty of cabanas and chairs to relax in. A pool shower, toilets and a guest laundry is available along with food and drink delivery via a phone on the pool deck.  The Asian Spice restaurant downstairs served great food and an al-a-carte breakfast with a smile. Overall we loved this hotel and it will be our first choice when we return. If I had to picky and say anything negative it would be the storage space for clothing in the room but we were ok living out of the suitcase for the 7 days. Great hotel, location and staff. We will be back.
Staff very pleasant and helpful. Breakfast good quality.
Last week I went to Bali and stayed at Rama residence. It was nice and clean. Staff also very friendly. Very good for family.
The hotel is located close to the beach. The facilities are decent. The service is wonderful, probably best hotel service I had.
PERFECT LOCATION! Great facilities & I would stay again.  They could improve on breakfast offerings & provide 'real' fresh juice not mixed in with concentrates or water - tasted awful

The impeccable service started upon reaching the hotel. Kadek at the reception gave us such a warm and friendly welcome! It was like meeting a long time friend. 
Next, we were given a complimentary upgrade to a 1 bedroom suite! The room was really big with the sofa bed easily accommodating 2 pax and the other beds another 2 more.
kitchenette was fully equipped with a pot, ladles, cutleries, 3 knives etc. Had a water dispenser in the room as well, no need to boil water at all. Toilets were spacious as well and had a raindrop shower!
Rooftop pool was great with a nice view of the sea and waves crashing down. Can even catch the sunset from here! Will definitely come back here in my future trips!
Great location
Nice hotel, excellent staff,Nice atmosphere in restaurant, not full of sports T.Vs and reasonably priced.
We just came back from a week in a studio room. Very happy with our room bed was comfortable room was clean and great location. Will be back again. Staff were lovely.

We got off to a rough start. The room type we booked was not available, we were offered another room configuration. It was frustrating and time consuming but staff did their best to resolve snd gave us free b/fast and transfers. Close to beach, great restaurants and shopping. The hotel has a rooftop pool with views of beach, nice area for a swim. Lovely restaurant for breakfast downstairs with friendly staff. We stayed in 1 bedroom which was spacious for two adults and two children.  Good hotel as a base we were out and about so convient and staff welcoming and helpful.

reviews.summary: A very enjoyable stay at Rama Residence Padma
reviews.content:
We recently returned from a 2-week stay at the Rama Residence Padma (RRP) in Bali. 
The RRP is a small boutique hotel with about 38 rooms. Our mini suite was extremely comfortable and well maintained during our entire stay.
I can’t say enough about the customer focused service that we received from virtually every member of the RRP staff we met. Upon arrival we were warmly greeted by Indri and another staff member who guided us to the small but very personalized reception area. After a cold towel and a welcome drink, Teguh who checked us in, took us to our room and did a walk around highlighting some key features.
The highlight of our stay was the RRP staff. Every staff member, who are clearly well trained in delivering top notch customer service, treated us like royalty. The personal touch was evident in every interaction we had with any of them. No request was too big or small. We noted several instances where staff clearly went the extra mile. A special thanks to Kadek, Dana and Teguh for all their guidance and assistance during our stay.
The weekly cocktail parties on the terrace (which is great for viewing some amazing sunsets), provided an excellent opportunity to mingle with other hotel guests.
A special thanks to Indri who with her ever smiling demeanour was always ready to provide helpful guidance. Thank you so much Indri. Finally, a big thanks to Richard for putting together such a wonderful team and keeping this operation running like clockwork.

Nice stay and very nice staff
Convenient location not so far from the beach and airport
above expectation and a place that i wil definitely go back in the future.

New hotel, excellent breakfast with a lot of choices the big breakfast is absolutely massive. Great rooftop pool with a view over the area. Near restaurants and around the corner to market shopping. Beach just down the road, excellent stay and staff very friendly.

I had 9 nights here and I was happy to have chosen this place to stay. It was conveniently located for both shopping and the beach. I enjoyed the view from the roof top pool. 
The staff here is extremely service minded and I had a really good time. The restaurant in the hotel is really good as well. Breakfast is a la carte and you have a wide array of choices. 
I thought cocktail night was nice as well. You got to meet other guests at the roof top pool - the drinks were nice as well. They offer Virgin versions of their cocktails as well.

Amazing! Room was very comfortable, beds were soo nice,dining, lounge, 2 TVs, couldn't want anything more. Lovely rooftop pool. Friendly Staff. Close to Beach Restaurants and Shopping
Will return!

From checking in we felt so welcome. A surprise upgrade was very much appreciated. Our room was spacious and clean and airconditioner worked very well. 
Staff were amazing and we couldn’t fault our stay at all. 
Hotel is in an excellent location very close to everything.
10 days of stay in fairly new service apartment type accommodation in great location.  Helpful, polite and friendly staff.
Absolutely amazing Hotel. Staff could not do enough for the guest. Perfect location for exploring the Isalnd.

We stayed at the Rama Residence for 3 nights. The hotel is a 3 minute walk to the beach. There are bars, cafes, restaurants on the doir step. The hotel has a beautiful restaurant, serving excellent meals. Breakfast was a la carte. The rooftop pool was relaxing with amazing views of Legian beach, where we could watch the sunset. The staff are friendly and obliging. Cannot fault this hotel.

Great hotel with a nice pool just a few minutes away from the beach. Nice to rest on the roof away from all the craziness around the area. 
Only getting a "room upgrade" wasn't so nice. The studio is split between kitchen, living room and bedroom. The deluxe room would have been more spacious since it's only a bedroom.

reviews.summary: Really awesome feeling during our stay
reviews.content: This is our first time in Bali but the room and hotel was very good. Staff are very helpful and amenities are well managed. Really recommend to others and love to stay again in next trip.

reviews.summary: Fantastic boutique hotel close to beach
reviews.content: Loved the Rama Residence. An awesome little boutique hotel close to beach, great shopping and lots of yummy restaurants. Asian Spice in the lobby is also tasty and does a great breakfast. Comfortable bed, really cold air con and decent sized rooms. Loved it. Would definitely stay again!

What a gem!!! This hotel is ideally located close to the Legian beach BUT a little 'safe distance' from the younger crowds in the Kuta area.

The hotel is beautifully decorated and quite welcoming. The facilities are quite complete and well thought out. I love the idea of providing a washer/dryer. The gym is sufficient. The infinity pool...amazing!

The shining point of this hotel is the staff. We were greeted by the house manager Richard upon arrival. He was very helpful and accommodating and invited our family to a small gathering he was hosting to showcase the facilities and provide support & answer questions about tours, etc. Ms. Indri, the guest relations manager was also very welcoming and provided great suggestions on how to make the most of our trip. I appreciate how they both checked in regularly with the staff about their stay. 

The front desk agents Ms. Kadek and Mr. Teguh were very kind and accommodating as well. 

The food in the restaurant was exceptional. Mr. Richard bragged about how everything is made from scratch and there are no microwaves to be found in their kitchen and the taste definitely reflected the quality of the food. Mr. Eka was very helpful along with the many other waiters and waitresses. 

Again, the Rama Residence Padma is a gem. Not only because of the good location and great facilities BUT mainly because of the teamwork amongst the staff to create a special and memorable experience for all of its guests.

reviews.summary: This Hotel is definitely one of the best
reviews.content: This was my first time staying at Rama Residence I would highly recommend this hotel. Rooms are very comfortable and spacious. Staff work hard to please you and make your stay a memorable one. Richard and his team need thumbs up for the way this hotel runs smoothly. Can’t wait to stay there again. Ten out of ten for me.
Good fun, great place to stay. Had free cocktails by the pool every few days to meet and greet other patrons of the hotel, was good way to learn more about the things others had seen.

Had a pleasant experience staying at this new hotel, room was comfy and always returned after a day out to a spotless room. Staff were always happy to help anyway they could and would happily return when visiting Bali again.

The perfect tranquil, boutique resort at the heart of Legian, 2min walk to the beach at the end of the street, shops and restaurants that cater for everyone at your door step, yet when you enter the resort it is so quit and peaceful. Perfect.
Loved it

Awesome staff, made our table special for my husbands birthday, special pudding and a special cake when we got back to room. Room was fine ,cleaned daily and replenished with clean towels and complimentary water. Would definitely  return but maybe upgrade to a one bedroom suite.overall stay was great and relaxing.
reviews.reply:
Dear Our Valued Guest,

Warmest Greeting from Rama Residence Padma,

Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.
Much appreciated to your constructive feedback, we have taken noted and we are sure that it will be an encouragement to improve our services.
And it's been our pleasure to make our guest satisfy with our service and hope you grant us another opportunity in the future to serve you again.
Thank you.

reviews.content:
Hotel is new and staff are lovely and friendly, had best night sleep ever in the king size bed. Close to the beach, markets, restaurants and bars. 
Amazing Indian food and service. Situation of restaurant receives lovely cool breeze all times of day. Just like the Fremantle Doctor...
Rooftop pool has lovely cool water to refresh and can take own drinks around pool. Lovely to watch sunset from away from buzz of beach.

There are also combined washer/dryers on site. 

Lovely relaxing stay

Great location, fantastic staff who were very friendly and accomodating.  It was a very comfortable room.  Wish our bathroom was bigger as we had no bench space.  We did look at other rooms in the hotel which did have bigger bathrooms so maybe it was just our room.  Overall it was a great experience and I would stay again.

Stayed here for ten days,our room was under the Gym and Laundry, so , noisy. The pool has no steps or ladders or any sort of safety rail, and having arthritis it was not possible to get in and out of the Pool, so we could not swim, there were rats in the ceiling space, the management tried to stop them but to no avail.There are no gardens or grounds, so basically we had a very expensive B&B. The Restaurant is good and the staff are excellent,especially the Reception staff.

Fantastic hotel close to beach & resturants. 
Room was amazing so new and fresh,bed was like a marshmallow : ) linen & pillows to die for with block out blinds. Tv in both rooms,lounge with a sofa. Bathroom had good hot water with high pressure & rain shower head Kitchen with convention microwave & everything you could need.
Breakfast for us was ok but being a new hotel it will improve. 
The staff made it a pleasure they are such beautiful and hardworking people who catered to our every need.
Infinity pool roof top was the show stopper & easy drink service with the most beautiful cocktails. Sunrise and sunset this is the place to be.
